meanings.definition: A batch of goods sent to a retailer for sale on a sale or return basis.
meanings.sent1: The store received a consignment of new clothes to sell.
meanings.sent2: The consignment of books arrived at the bookstore yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The consignment of toys brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent4: Her consignment of handmade jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The consignment of fresh fruits filled the market with color.

meanings.definition: The action of consigning or delivering something.
meanings.sent1: The consignment of the package was swift and efficient.
meanings.sent2: She handled the consignment of documents with care.
meanings.sent3: The consignment of cookies was a delicious surprise.
meanings.sent4: His consignment of jokes always lightened the mood.
meanings.sent5: The consignment of love letters touched her heart deeply.
